responseText: NSLOCTEXT("[70199B914E7E03A9706A1499CF20B1FD]", "437B66C449E2570C349E049E7A124985", "Shipments to Halcyon are delayed or missing altogether. If you\'re headed East from here, keep an eye out for bandits. They\'re likely to have set up an ambush down the road. Take down any that have wandered out of the Citadel, and cause trouble for them in any way you can. We\'ll make them regret any defiance they\'ve put up against the authority of the Kaelar Army.")
name: CSQ_RVR_0081_FB_NordenResnick_DLG_16
